info.author: Mike Meyer
info.description:
open knows how to open/edit/etc. files

Open keeps a per-user database mapping pairs of actions
(open, edit, convert, ...) and file extensions to command invocations, and
applies them upon request. If it fails to find an application for an (action,
extension) tuple, it will ask the user what to use, and record that
application for later use.
info.name: open
info.html_description:
open knows how to open/edit/etc. files

Open keeps a per-user database mapping pairs of actions (open, edit, convert, …) and file extensions to command invocations, and applies them upon request. If it fails to find an application for an (action, extension) tuple, it will ask the user what to use, and record that application for later use.
